title: Diamond bolts

properties.name: description
properties.value: Diamond bolts are adamant bolts tipped with diamond bolt tips. They are the fourth strongest gem-tipped bolt in the game. These bolts can be created using the Fletching skill. 65 Fletching is required to make these bolts, and 7 Fletching experience is rewarded per bolt created.

Advanced data
Item ID9340

Diamond bolts are adamant bolts tipped with diamond bolt tips. They are the fourth strongest gem-tipped bolt in the game. These bolts can be created using the Fletching skill. 65 Fletching is required to make these bolts, and 7 Fletching experience is rewarded per bolt created.

Diamond bolts can be enchanted with the Enchant Crossbow Bolt spell, producing Diamond bolts (e). This requires 57 Magic. The spell enchants 10 bolts at a time.

'''Diamond bolts''' are [[adamant bolts]] tipped with [[diamond bolt tips]]. They are the fourth strongest [[Gems|gem]]-tipped bolt in the game. These bolts can be created using the [[Fletching]] [[Skills|skill]]. 65 Fletching is required to make these bolts, and 7 Fletching [[experience]] is rewarded per bolt created.

Diamond bolts can be enchanted with the [[Enchant Crossbow Bolt]] spell, producing [[Diamond bolts (e)]]. This requires 57 [[Magic]]. The spell enchants 10 bolts at a time.
